statements: UPDATE ReliefEfforts SET aid_amount = 5000.00 WHERE relief_id = 1;
UPDATE ReliefEfforts SET location = 'New Location', impact_rating = 5 WHERE relief_id = 2;
UPDATE ReliefEfforts SET impact_rating = 5, aid_amount = 25000.00 WHERE relief_id = 100;
UPDATE ReliefEfforts SET location = 'New York', date = '2022-12-31' WHERE relief_id = 200;
UPDATE ReliefEfforts SET total_expenses = 15000.75 WHERE relief_id = 1001;
UPDATE EvaluationMetrics SET impact_score = 9, effectiveness_rating = 'Positive' WHERE relief_id = 1002;
UPDATE ReliefEfforts SET total_expenses = total_expenses + 5000 WHERE relief_id = 123
UPDATE EvaluationMetrics SET impact_score = 9, effectiveness_rating = 'High' WHERE evaluation_id = 456
UPDATE disaster_areas SET relief_efforts = 100 WHERE area_id = 1;
UPDATE relief_supplies SET quantity = 50 WHERE supply_name = 'Water';
UPDATE disaster_areas SET relief_efforts = 500 WHERE area_id = 1
UPDATE relief_workers SET area_id = 2, worker_name = 'John Doe' WHERE worker_id = 3
UPDATE relief_efforts SET amount_spent = 5000.00, success = true WHERE organization_id = 1 AND location_id = 3;
UPDATE organizations SET type = 'Non-Profit', name = 'Updated Organization' WHERE organization_id = 5;
UPDATE relief_efforts SET amount_spent = 5000.50, success = true WHERE organization_id = 1 AND location_id = 3;
UPDATE organizations SET contact_person = 'John Doe', location = 'New York' WHERE organization_id = 5;
UPDATE ReliefEfforts SET location = 'New Location', start_date = '2022-09-01', end_date = '2022-09-30' WHERE relief_id = 123;
UPDATE SuccessMetrics SET metric_value = 75.50, metric_type = 'Impact Factor' WHERE metric_id = 456;
UPDATE ReliefEfforts SET location = 'New Location', start_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE relief_id = 1001;
UPDATE Donations SET amount = 5000.00, donation_date = '2022-11-15' WHERE donor_name = 'John Doe';
